name: embed-files-in-node-server
description: A POC that embeds files (like plain files or images) in a single server.js file.

scripts.start: rm -rf build && cd frontity && npx frontity build && cd .. && npx webpack && rm -rf frontity/build && node serve.js
scripts.debug: rm -rf build && cd frontity && npx frontity build && cd .. && npx webpack && rm -rf frontity/build && node --inspect serve.js

author: @luisherranz
